body:
Hey, So, This is the “Hub” to my A day Inside a Teamspeak Translator, A series that I will be doing about the life of a Ts Transalor, This will all happen on the Kohi Ts, As I'm both French and Spanish Translator.
I'll update This Post when I post episodes.

What do you all think about this idea?

title: A day inside a Teamspeak Translator.

replies.body: So much op. Of course it's will be good for spanish and people who speak spanish. Also french is a great idea. Frenchs are op at PvP
